metadata.description: Advanced class presentation skills for first-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何做更高级的班级展示。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'Good morning class, today I want to tell you about my family'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Good morning class, today I want to tell you about my family

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! That's a perfect presentation opening!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Thank you for listening. Are there any questions?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Thank you for listening. Are there any questions?
